Anna Hiss Gym 2.204, 2501 Wichita St,

Oguzhan Akcin is a PhD student in ECE since 2021. He holds a B.Sc. in Electrical and Electronics Engineering from Bogazici University, Istanbul. Oguzhan is interested in multi-agent systems, game theory, and generative AI.
